pgrid.network.protocol
Class PGridMessageImp

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      pgrid.util.LexicalDefaultHandler
          pgrid.network.protocol.PGridMessageImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, LexicalHandler, Message, PGridMessage, XMLizable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ACKMessage, BootstrapMessage, BootstrapReplyMessage, ChallengeMessage, ChallengeReplyMessage, ExchangeCSVIndexEntriesMessage, ExchangeIndexEntriesMessage, ExchangeInvitationMessage, ExchangeMessage, ExchangeReplyMessage, FidgetExchangeMessage, FidgetExchangeReplyMessage, GenericMessage, GetFile, GetFileReply, IndexModifierCSVMessage, IndexModifierMessage, MaintenanceMessage, NaFTConnectionRegisterMessage, NaFTConnectionRegisterReplyMessage, NaFTConnectionReversalInitMessage, NaFTConnectionReversalInitReplyMessage, PeerLookupMessage, PeerLookupReplyMessage, QueryMessage, QueryReplyMessage, RangeQueryMessage, ReplicateMessage, RouterACKMessage, SearchPathMessage, SearchPathReplyMessage
public abstract class PGridMessageImp
extends LexicalDefaultHandler
implements PGridMessage, XMLizable

This class is a helper class for everyone willing to create a new message for P-Grid. Each message should be cloneable therefor if a message use mutable object, it should implement clone method and clone those field.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Renault John
